Package model

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
model.Entity
model.Rect
model.Sprite
public class Sprite extends Rect
Sprite is a rectangle entity that contains one or many images which it can cycle through and return when the rendering loop needs it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sprite(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height)
    Construct a new sprite (and set the initial image to null).
    Sprite(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height, String imagePath)
    Construct a new sprite, but have the sprite fetch the Image from a path.
    Sprite(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height, javafx.scene.image.Image spriteImage)
    Construct a new sprite.

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(Game game, float x, float y, float width, float height, javafx.scene.image.Image spriteImage)
      Construct a new sprite.
      Parameters:
      game - to instantiate to
      x - absolute x to spawn at (centered)
      y - absolute y to spawn at (centered)
      width - to scale collider and sprite to
      height - to scale collider and sprite to
      spriteImage - to set initial image to

      x - absolute x to spawn at (centered)
      y - absolute y to spawn at (centered)
      width - to scale collider and sprite to
      height - to scale collider and sprite to
      imagePath - a path to fetch the initial image to

      public void setImage(javafx.scene.image.Image... images)
      Add image or images to the sprite image list. It will clear any images that were previously in the image list.
      Parameters:
      images - to add

      Parameters:
      imagePaths - to add

    • setColor

      public void setColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Sets a given color to the image. Only pure white pixels will be changed.
      Parameters:
      color - to set all images in image list to
